CSI: Crime Sob Investigação
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"=G="},"dateCreated":"2004-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertainment on steroids","reviewBody":"The hugely popular "CSI" is no less than a contemporary entertainment marvel. Finding its stride in season 2 with a formula which pushes the envelope while still being doable, this series packs ample portions of entertainment into 40 minute episodes while staying fresh, delivering palatable doses of science didactically, and, most of all, manifesting a strong sense of social responsibility in all of its subliminals. While most entertainment aims for the crotch, the gut, or the heart, "CSI" goes for the most difficult target, the head, as it teaches forensics and the empirical process while remaining cooly detached from sensationalism and melodrama all the while using the "truth is stranger (and more interesting) than fiction" thesis to its and our advantage. The results are fun and interesting lessons in everything from dwarfism to Down syndrome to anatomy to ballistics to etc. all the while maintaining a social conscience. Whether explaining how S&M is not necessarily perversion to simply dissing Don King, "CSI" is one sweet sugar coated education with solid mainstream values. My favorite lines? CSI1:"There's a sucker born every minute." CSI2: "Yeah. And they all come to Vegas." Truer words....","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80000,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. CSI: Miami
programme.sub-title: You May Now Kill the Bride
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"olive_oil56"},"dateCreated":"2004-09-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"A show you shouldn't miss!","reviewBody":"I have watched this show from the very beginning, and wouldn't miss a single episode for anything in the world. The cast are the best.

The writer has certainly got an unbelievable talent, and how he comes to his conclusions is just beyond me. I never miss an episode, and I tape each show, along with Law & Order, which is another great show. It shows on Saturdays and Tuesdays here in England. David Caruso, well, he's my idol, he is so sweet and shy looking, He is a brilliant actor. Each case is detailed and examined, and the results are just outstanding. IMDb data; ttnr: 0313043, Title: CSI: Miami, --- Description: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"olive_oil56","dateCreated":"2004-09-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"A show you shouldn't miss!","reviewBody":"I have watched this show from the very beginning, and wouldn't miss a single episode for anything in the world. The cast are the best.

The writer has certainly got an unbelievable talent, and how he comes to his conclusions is just beyond me. I never miss an episode, and I tape each show, along with Law & Order, which is another great show. It shows on Saturdays and Tuesdays here in England. David Caruso, well, he's my idol, he is so sweet and shy looking, He is a brilliant actor. Each case is detailed and examined, and the results are just outstanding. C.S.I.Miami is one if my favorites I have even looked up each character on the Internet and got a better insight to them all. I hope they keep turning out more shows.

Investigação Criminal: Los Angeles
programme.desc: NCIS: Los Angeles: Created by Shane Brennan. With Chris O'Donnell, Daniela Ruah, LL Cool J, Linda Hunt. The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1378167/","name":"NCIS: Los Angeles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQzNGIzNmEtNWE3ZS00OTUyLTg3YTEtMDY3NDViZWE0YWY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1378167/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"babettex5"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Linda Hunt is the main reason I tune in","reviewBody":"As opposed to other reviewers who are sadly so limited they can only conceive of Linda Hunt as an object of derision, I tune in specifically to see her. The show is adequate. I've always liked LL Cool J and it's nice to see Chris O'Donnell again. (The nerds suck, especially when you consider Abby from the original show.) But it's the presence of Linda Hunt that elevates this show. She's a rich, interesting actor and her character here has a great backstory.\n\nSure this team could be managed by yet another grizzled actor playing a tough as nails former Navy Seal type, whose life has been touched by tragedy because his wife died of breast cancer or his little girl choked on a marble. I'd rather have Linda Hunt because she is a true original. I've seen enough shallow cookie cutter actors with impossibly white teeth and ripped abs. Now I want to watch stories about people who are unique and unusual and earthy and human.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50785,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2009-09-22","keywords":"copaganda,shared universe,spinoff,punctuation in title,male protagonist","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000563/","name":"Chris O'Donnell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2079733/","name":"Daniela Ruah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005112/","name":"LL Cool J"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0285100/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114905/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0107402/","name":"Shane Brennan"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2326248985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1378167/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"babettex5"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Linda Hunt is the main reason I tune in","reviewBody":"As opposed to other reviewers who are sadly so limited they can only conceive of Linda Hunt as an object of derision, I tune in specifically to see her. The show is adequate. I've always liked LL Cool J and it's nice to see Chris O'Donnell again. (The nerds suck, especially when you consider Abby from the original show.) But it's the presence of Linda Hunt that elevates this show. programme.title: Magnum P.I
Magnum P.I.
programme.desc:
Magnum P.I.: Created by Eric Guggenheim, Peter M. Lenkov. With Jay Hernandez, Perdita Weeks, Zachary Knighton, Stephen Hill. An ex-Navy SEAL returns from Afghanistan and uses his military skills to become a private investigator in Hawaii." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7942796/","name":"Magnum P.I.","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzMzMGZjYjktNzNiMi00MDEyLWEyYzAtOWJmZTY1NGUyNTkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjYwNDA2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-Navy SEAL returns from Afghanistan and uses his military skills to become a private investigator in Hawaii.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7942796/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"carey-941-755692"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's not that Higgins is a woman, it is that she is a young woman","reviewBody":"For some reason, there are many reviewers here who are upset about Higgins being portrayed by a woman. I don't really care about Higgins being cast as a woman. What I miss is the relationship in the original show, a relationship which cannot exist in this reboot of the show.

In the original series, Magnum and Higgins represented two archetypes.

Higgins, the elder of the two, represented a warrior of an older, for formal era. As we learned more about him, we discovered that his stiff upper lip concealed an action-packed history of service.

Magnum, the younger, represented the Viet Nam era. During this time, military service was changing, reflecting the less formal society of the 1960's and 70's. Service people came home with the memories of a wet jungle war and were no longer considered heroes.

Over the course of the series, we saw a grudging growth by both, each gaining respect for the other. While almost never a central element of any story, the ongoing subplot enriched the series. As well, Higgins age and experience allowed the character to be both a hero and a damsel in distress without negative impact.

In this reboot, Higgins is younger than Magnum. She is intelligent, attractive, supremely confident and competent in almost all things. By resetting the structure in this way, she becomes an antagonistic partner and an ongoing potential love interest. Moreover, if we consider Magnum a competent protagonist, she cannot bring the element of greater experience to the relationship.

The Higgins character could easily be played by by either a male or female. I suppose that casting Perdita Weeks, who plays what she is given with some skill, was to appeal to middle aged men who enjoy the scenery. Had they cast a woman 20 years older, a different older chemistry could have blossomed, one of respect, cooperation and affection. In this remake, we are stuck with another will they/won't they relationship.

This remake is unexceptional and it hardly required watching for me. Still, it had potential.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10679,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2018-09-24","keywords":"hawaii,private investigator,remake,former navy sea air and land force,car","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0379596/","name":"Jay Hernandez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0917347/","name":"Perdita Weeks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461149/","name":"Zachary Knighton"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0715350/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374900/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1325865/","name":"Eric Guggenheim"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006997/","name":"Peter M. Lenkov"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi134527769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjM3ODY1M2MtYjdhMC00ZjM3LWFlNmEtODIzYjk4MzVjYjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjM3ODY1M2MtYjdhMC00ZjM3LWFlNmEtODIzYjk4MzVjYjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

In the original series, Magnum and Higgins represented two archetypes.

Higgins, the elder of the two, represented a warrior of an older, for formal era. As we learned more about him, we discovered that his stiff upper lip concealed an action-packed history of service.

Magnum, the younger, represented the Viet Nam era. During this time, military service was changing, reflecting the less formal society of the 1960's and 70's. Service people came home with the memories of a wet jungle war and were no longer considered heroes.

programme.title: Daybreakers - O Último Vampiro
programme.desc: Uma praga transformou a maioria da população em vampiros. Os humanos são perseguidos e em breve vão tornar-se uma espécie em vias de extinção. Entretanto, um investigador vampiro tenta encontrar um substituto antes de os humanos se extinguirem.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
CSI: Crime Sob Investigação
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"=G="},"dateCreated":"2004-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertainment on steroids","reviewBody":"The hugely popular "CSI" is no less than a contemporary entertainment marvel. Finding its stride in season 2 with a formula which pushes the envelope while still being doable, this series packs ample portions of entertainment into 40 minute episodes while staying fresh, delivering palatable doses of science didactically, and, most of all, manifesting a strong sense of social responsibility in all of its subliminals. While most entertainment aims for the crotch, the gut, or the heart, "CSI" goes for the most difficult target, the head, as it teaches forensics and the empirical process while remaining cooly detached from sensationalism and melodrama all the while using the "truth is stranger (and more interesting) than fiction" thesis to its and our advantage. The results are fun and interesting lessons in everything from dwarfism to Down syndrome to anatomy to ballistics to etc. all the while maintaining a social conscience. Whether explaining how S&M is not necessarily perversion to simply dissing Don King, "CSI" is one sweet sugar coated education with solid mainstream values. My favorite lines? CSI1:"There's a sucker born every minute." CSI2: "Yeah. And they all come to Vegas." Truer words....","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80000,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Season 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2534388761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk2MmYxYTEtNjljNC00MGYwLWJkOWMtZDZjMmFlMjc5YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk2MmYxYTEtNjljNC00MGYwLWJkOWMtZDZjMmFlMjc5YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"}}</script><metacontent="

Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"=G="},"dateCreated":"2004-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertainment on steroids","reviewBody":"The hugely popular "CSI" is no less than a contemporary entertainment marvel. Finding its stride in season 2 with a formula which pushes the envelope while still being doable, this series packs ample portions of entertainment into 40 minute episodes while staying fresh, delivering palatable doses of science didactically, and, most of all, manifesting a strong sense of social responsibility in all of its subliminals. While most entertainment aims for the crotch, the gut, or the heart, "CSI" goes for the most difficult target, the head, as it teaches forensics and the empirical process while remaining cooly detached from sensationalism and melodrama all the while using the "truth is stranger (and more interesting) than fiction" thesis to its and our advantage. The results are fun and interesting lessons in everything from dwarfism to Down syndrome to anatomy to ballistics to etc. all the while maintaining a social conscience. Whether explaining how S&M is not necessarily perversion to simply dissing Don King, "CSI" is one sweet sugar coated education with solid mainstream values. My favorite lines? CSI1:"There's a sucker born every minute." CSI2: "Yeah. And they all come to Vegas." programme.desc: NCIS: Los Angeles: Created by Shane Brennan. With Chris O'Donnell, Daniela Ruah, LL Cool J, Linda Hunt. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1378167/","name":"NCIS: Los Angeles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQzNGIzNmEtNWE3ZS00OTUyLTg3YTEtMDY3NDViZWE0YWY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1378167/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"babettex5"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Linda Hunt is the main reason I tune in","reviewBody":"As opposed to other reviewers who are sadly so limited they can only conceive of Linda Hunt as an object of derision, I tune in specifically to see her. The show is adequate. I've always liked LL Cool J and it's nice to see Chris O'Donnell again. (The nerds suck, especially when you consider Abby from the original show.) But it's the presence of Linda Hunt that elevates this show. She's a rich, interesting actor and her character here has a great backstory.\n\nSure this team could be managed by yet another grizzled actor playing a tough as nails former Navy Seal type, whose life has been touched by tragedy because his wife died of breast cancer or his little girl choked on a marble. I'd rather have Linda Hunt because she is a true original. I've seen enough shallow cookie cutter actors with impossibly white teeth and ripped abs. Now I want to watch stories about people who are unique and unusual and earthy and human.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50785,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2009-09-22","keywords":"copaganda,shared universe,spinoff,punctuation in title,male protagonist","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000563/","name":"Chris O'Donnell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2079733/","name":"Daniela Ruah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005112/","name":"LL Cool J"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0285100/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114905/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0107402/","name":"Shane Brennan"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2326248985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
Investigação Criminal: New Orleans
programme.desc: NCIS: New Orleans: Created by Gary Glasberg. With Scott Bakula, Rob Kerkovich, CCH Pounder, Daryl Mitchell. Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3560084/","name":"NCIS: New Orleans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM3OTk1NTQyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3560084/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"household137"},"dateCreated":"2014-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Review of NCIS New Orleans","reviewBody":"As a New Orleans native I implore you and the writers to walk down any street in New Orleans and talk to a LOCAL. programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
Investigação Criminal: Los Angeles
programme.desc: NCIS: Los Angeles: Created by Shane Brennan. With Chris O'Donnell, Daniela Ruah, LL Cool J, Linda Hunt. The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1378167/","name":"NCIS: Los Angeles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQzNGIzNmEtNWE3ZS00OTUyLTg3YTEtMDY3NDViZWE0YWY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1378167/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"babettex5"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Linda Hunt is the main reason I tune in","reviewBody":"As opposed to other reviewers who are sadly so limited they can only conceive of Linda Hunt as an object of derision, I tune in specifically to see her. The show is adequate. I've always liked LL Cool J and it's nice to see Chris O'Donnell again. (The nerds suck, especially when you consider Abby from the original show.) But it's the presence of Linda Hunt that elevates this show. She's a rich, interesting actor and her character here has a great backstory.\n\nSure this team could be managed by yet another grizzled actor playing a tough as nails former Navy Seal type, whose life has been touched by tragedy because his wife died of breast cancer or his little girl choked on a marble. I'd rather have Linda Hunt because she is a true original. I've seen enough shallow cookie cutter actors with impossibly white teeth and ripped abs. programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
CSI: Crime Sob Investigação
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"=G="},"dateCreated":"2004-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertainment on steroids","reviewBody":"The hugely popular "CSI" is no less than a contemporary entertainment marvel. Finding its stride in season 2 with a formula which pushes the envelope while still being doable, this series packs ample portions of entertainment into 40 minute episodes while staying fresh, delivering palatable doses of science didactically, and, most of all, manifesting a strong sense of social responsibility in all of its subliminals. While most entertainment aims for the crotch, the gut, or the heart, "CSI" goes for the most difficult target, the head, as it teaches forensics and the empirical process while remaining cooly detached from sensationalism and melodrama all the while using the "truth is stranger (and more interesting) than fiction" thesis to its and our advantage. The results are fun and interesting lessons in everything from dwarfism to Down syndrome to anatomy to ballistics to etc. all the while maintaining a social conscience. Whether explaining how S&M is not necessarily perversion to simply dissing Don King, "CSI" is one sweet sugar coated education with solid mainstream values. My favorite lines? CSI1:"There's a sucker born every minute." CSI2: "Yeah. And they all come to Vegas." Truer words....","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80000,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"olive_oil56"},"dateCreated":"2004-09-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"A show you shouldn't miss!","reviewBody":"I have watched this show from the very beginning, and wouldn't miss a single episode for anything in the world. The cast are the best.

The writer has certainly got an unbelievable talent, and how he comes to his conclusions is just beyond me. I never miss an episode, and I tape each show, along with Law & Order, which is another great show. It shows on Saturdays and Tuesdays here in England. David Caruso, well, he's my idol, he is so sweet and shy looking, He is a brilliant actor. Each case is detailed and examined, and the results are just outstanding. C.S.I.Miami is one if my favorites I have even looked up each character on the Internet and got a better insight to them all. I hope they keep turning out more shows.

Keep it up Guys!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55211,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"olive_oil56","dateCreated":"2004-09-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"A show you shouldn't miss!","reviewBody":"I have watched this show from the very beginning, and wouldn't miss a single episode for anything in the world. The cast are the best.

The writer has certainly got an unbelievable talent, and how he comes to his conclusions is just beyond me. I never miss an episode, and I tape each show, along with Law & Order, which is another great show. It shows on Saturdays and Tuesdays here in England. David Caruso, well, he's my idol, he is so sweet and shy looking, He is a brilliant actor. Each case is detailed and examined, and the results are just outstanding. C.S.I.Miami is one if my favorites I have even looked up each character on the Internet and got a better insight to them all. I hope they keep turning out more shows.

Investigação Criminal: Los Angeles
programme.desc: NCIS: Los Angeles: Created by Shane Brennan. With Chris O'Donnell, Daniela Ruah, LL Cool J, Linda Hunt. The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1378167/","name":"NCIS: Los Angeles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQzNGIzNmEtNWE3ZS00OTUyLTg3YTEtMDY3NDViZWE0YWY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1378167/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"babettex5"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Linda Hunt is the main reason I tune in","reviewBody":"As opposed to other reviewers who are sadly so limited they can only conceive of Linda Hunt as an object of derision, I tune in specifically to see her. The show is adequate. I've always liked LL Cool J and it's nice to see Chris O'Donnell again. (The nerds suck, especially when you consider Abby from the original show.) But it's the presence of Linda Hunt that elevates this show. She's a rich, interesting actor and her character here has a great backstory.\n\nSure this team could be managed by yet another grizzled actor playing a tough as nails former Navy Seal type, whose life has been touched by tragedy because his wife died of breast cancer or his little girl choked on a marble. I'd rather have Linda Hunt because she is a true original. I've seen enough shallow cookie cutter actors with impossibly white teeth and ripped abs. Now I want to watch stories about people who are unique and unusual and earthy and human.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50785,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2009-09-22","keywords":"copaganda,shared universe,spinoff,punctuation in title,male protagonist","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000563/","name":"Chris O'Donnell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2079733/","name":"Daniela Ruah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005112/","name":"LL Cool J"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0285100/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114905/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0107402/","name":"Shane Brennan"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2326248985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1378167/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"babettex5","dateCreated":"2010-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Linda Hunt is the main reason I tune in","reviewBody":"As opposed to other reviewers who are sadly so limited they can only conceive of Linda Hunt as an object of derision, I tune in specifically to see her. The show is adequate. I've always liked LL Cool J and it's nice to see Chris O'Donnell again. (The nerds suck, especially when you consider Abby from the original show.) But it's the presence of Linda Hunt that elevates this show. She's a rich, interesting actor and her character here has a great backstory.\n\nSure this team could be managed by yet another grizzled actor playing a tough as nails former Navy Seal type, whose life has been touched by tragedy because his wife died of breast cancer or his little girl choked on a marble. I'd rather have Linda Hunt because she is a true original. I've seen enough shallow cookie cutter actors with impossibly white teeth and ripped abs. Now I want to watch stories about people who are unique and unusual and earthy and human.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50785,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2009-09-22","keywords":"copaganda,shared universe,spinoff,punctuation in title,male protagonist","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000563/","name":"Chris O'Donnell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2079733/","name":"Daniela Ruah","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005112/","name":"LL Cool J"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0285100/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114905/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0107402/","name":"Shane Brennan"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2326248985","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJjMDg5ZjMtNjczMS00MDc1LTlmMDItY2E3YTE0NzUxNzBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Dennis Smith, Terrence O'Hara, Tony Wharmby, John Peter Kousakis, James Hanlon

programme.title: Magnum P.I
Magnum P.I.
programme.desc:
Magnum P.I.: Created by Eric Guggenheim, Peter M. Lenkov. With Jay Hernandez, Perdita Weeks, Zachary Knighton, Stephen Hill. An ex-Navy SEAL returns from Afghanistan and uses his military skills to become a private investigator in Hawaii." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7942796/","name":"Magnum P.I.","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzMzMGZjYjktNzNiMi00MDEyLWEyYzAtOWJmZTY1NGUyNTkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjYwNDA2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-Navy SEAL returns from Afghanistan and uses his military skills to become a private investigator in Hawaii.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7942796/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"carey-941-755692"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's not that Higgins is a woman, it is that she is a young woman","reviewBody":"For some reason, there are many reviewers here who are upset about Higgins being portrayed by a woman. I don't really care about Higgins being cast as a woman. What I miss is the relationship in the original show, a relationship which cannot exist in this reboot of the show.

In the original series, Magnum and Higgins represented two archetypes.

Higgins, the elder of the two, represented a warrior of an older, for formal era. As we learned more about him, we discovered that his stiff upper lip concealed an action-packed history of service.

Magnum, the younger, represented the Viet Nam era. During this time, military service was changing, reflecting the less formal society of the 1960's and 70's. Service people came home with the memories of a wet jungle war and were no longer considered heroes.

Over the course of the series, we saw a grudging growth by both, each gaining respect for the other. While almost never a central element of any story, the ongoing subplot enriched the series. As well, Higgins age and experience allowed the character to be both a hero and a damsel in distress without negative impact.

In this reboot, Higgins is younger than Magnum. She is intelligent, attractive, supremely confident and competent in almost all things. By resetting the structure in this way, she becomes an antagonistic partner and an ongoing potential love interest. Moreover, if we consider Magnum a competent protagonist, she cannot bring the element of greater experience to the relationship.

The Higgins character could easily be played by by either a male or female. I suppose that casting Perdita Weeks, who plays what she is given with some skill, was to appeal to middle aged men who enjoy the scenery. Had they cast a woman 20 years older, a different older chemistry could have blossomed, one of respect, cooperation and affection. In this remake, we are stuck with another will they/won't they relationship.

This remake is unexceptional and it hardly required watching for me. Still, it had potential.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10679,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2018-09-24","keywords":"hawaii,private investigator,remake,former navy sea air and land force,car","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0379596/","name":"Jay Hernandez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0917347/","name":"Perdita Weeks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461149/","name":"Zachary Knighton"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0715350/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374900/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1325865/","name":"Eric Guggenheim"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006997/","name":"Peter M. Lenkov"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi134527769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjM3ODY1M2MtYjdhMC00ZjM3LWFlNmEtODIzYjk4MzVjYjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjM3ODY1M2MtYjdhMC00ZjM3LWFlNmEtODIzYjk4MzVjYjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

I don't really care about Higgins being cast as a woman. What I miss is the relationship in the original show, a relationship which cannot exist in this reboot of the show.

In the original series, Magnum and Higgins represented two archetypes.

Higgins, the elder of the two, represented a warrior of an older, for formal era. As we learned more about him, we discovered that his stiff upper lip concealed an action-packed history of service.

Magnum, the younger, represented the Viet Nam era. During this time, military service was changing, reflecting the less formal society of the 1960's and 70's. Service people came home with the memories of a wet jungle war and were no longer considered heroes.

Over the course of the series, we saw a grudging growth by both, each gaining respect for the other. While almost never a central element of any story, the ongoing subplot enriched the series. As well, Higgins age and experience allowed the character to be both a hero and a damsel in distress without negative impact.

In this reboot, Higgins is younger than Magnum. She is intelligent, attractive, supremely confident and competent in almost all things. By resetting the structure in this way, she becomes an antagonistic partner and an ongoing potential love interest. Moreover, if we consider Magnum a competent protagonist, she cannot bring the element of greater experience to the relationship.

The Higgins character could easily be played by by either a male or female. I suppose that casting Perdita Weeks, who plays what she is given with some skill, was to appeal to middle aged men who enjoy the scenery. Had they cast a woman 20 years older, a different older chemistry could have blossomed, one of respect, cooperation and affection. In this remake, we are stuck with another will they/won't they relationship.

This remake is unexceptional and it hardly required watching for me. In the original series, Magnum and Higgins represented two archetypes.

Higgins, the elder of the two, represented a warrior of an older, for formal era. As we learned more about him, we discovered that his stiff upper lip concealed an action-packed history of service.

Magnum, the younger, represented the Viet Nam era. During this time, military service was changing, reflecting the less formal society of the 1960's and 70's. Service people came home with the memories of a wet jungle war and were no longer considered heroes.

programme.desc: No deserto, um grupo de vampiros descobre o túmulo de Drácula e ressuscita-o para que ele os ajude a capturar Blade. Já Blade é agora um homem procurado pelo FBI, e tem de juntar forças a um bando de caçadores de vampiros para enfrentar o seu mais perigoso inimigo até à data.

programme.title: The Birthday Wish
programme.desc: Com o 30º aniversário a aproximar-se a passos largos, Gwen Turner, uma jovem diretora de publicidade para TV que planeia cada detalhe da sua vida, espera que o namorado, Alex Stone, finalmente faça o pedido que ela tanto espera. Mas o destino parece não querer colaborar com este desejo...

programme.title: Sincerely, Yours, Truly
programme.desc: Quando encontra um anel de noivado com uma carta escondida numa gaveta do seu novo apartamento, uma mulher decide responder. O apaixonado misterioso responde de volta, o que dá início a uma série de correspondência e acontecimentos que vai mudar a vida dela para sempre! O amor realmente acontece...

programme.title: Campfire Kiss
programme.desc: Sentindo-se desligada do filho adolescente, uma mãe protetora decide sair da sua zona de conforto e leva-o a acampar. Mas começa a dar-se mal com o seu vizinho charmoso, um pai solteiro, que também procura solidificar a relação com a sua filha. A química entre ambos rapidamente começa a dar sinais.

programme.title: Romance Retreat
programme.desc: Após uma separação, a jornalista Dana Willingham vê-se sozinha e presa num retiro de ioga enquanto a maior história da sua carreira acontece a quilómetros de distância. Já o solitário bem-parecido que pernoita na estalagem é Stefan Gonzales, o guru da tecnologia que estava no centro do escândalo.

programme.title: A Lethal Lesson
programme.desc: Lauren vê a sua vida de pernas para o ar quando o seu emprego, a custódia da filha e até a sua segurança estão em perigo. Isto porque um aluno vingativo alega ter tido um caso com ela. Porém, quando o adolescente aparece quase morto, Lauren percebe que a ameaça está mais perto do que ela pensava.

programme.title: Clínica Privada
programme.sub-title: In Which Dell Finds His Fight

programme.title: Sealed With a Kiss
programme.desc: Bradley, um famoso cantor country, regressa às origens para vender uma casa, enquanto Sarah luta para manter de pé o rancho. Com a ajuda dela, Bradley planeia uma boda na aldeia, sendo que a noiva, estrela de cinema, planeia algo extravagante. Mas Bradley questiona-se se escolheu a mulher certa...

programme.title: Walking the Dog
programme.desc: Kristie Simmons, uma advogada, inicia uma batalha ao tentar obter aprovação para uma ciclovia para os moradores locais. Quando um veterinário informa que um cão chamado Gidget precisa de uma casa, Kristie aceita. Enquanto passeia com Gidget, conhece Keith, um advogado, e seu cão adorável, Simon.

programme.title: Starting Up Love
programme.desc: Quando Jillian recebe a notícia da morte de um tio abastado, descobre que ele lhe deixou a sua pitoresca cabana na montanha. E uma família que ela desconhecia! O plano de Jillian é vender a propriedade o mais rápido possível, mas quando conhece Liam, este faz-lhe uma proposta irrecusável.

programme.title: Destination Wedding
programme.desc: O ex-namorado de Ellie, Greg, é o padrinho de casamento da irmã de Ellie. Quando os noivos perdem o avião que os levaria até Acapulco, local do casamento, Ellie e Greg, que já estavam no local, são obrigados a trabalhar em conjunto para tomar as decisões relativas ao rumo do casamento.

programme.title: The Dating List
programme.desc: Abby Morel é uma assistente editorial a viver numa grande cidade. Com o objetivo de subir na carreira, faz um acordo incomum com Susan, a sua chefe. Susan está demasiado ocupada para ir a encontros, mas quer apaixonar-se. Abby concorda em analisar os possíveis pretendentes em troca de uma promoção.

programme.title: Sexo e a Cidade 2
programme.desc: As vidas das quatro amigas estão como elas sempre desejaram, mas isto não seria "Sexo e a Cidade" se não houvesse surpresas. Desta vez, decidem embarcar numa viagem para um dos lugares mais exóticos e misteriosos do mundo, onde a festa nunca tem fim. É o escape perfeito para todas!

programme.title: Contrabando
programme.desc: Chris abandonou a sua vida de crime, mas após Andy arruinar um negócio ao seu impiedoso patrão, Chris vê-se obrigado a voltar àquilo que melhor faz: contrabandear. Forma equipa com Sebastian para um golpe final no Panamá, mas quando o plano cai, terá de recorrer às suas enferrujadas habilidades!

programme.title: Um Trunfo na Manga
programme.desc: "Aces" aceitou testemunhar contra Sparazza, o patrão da Máfia, conhecido por ter mandado assassinar mais de 130 pessoas. No entanto, assim que se apercebe da traição, Sparazza põe a cabeça de "Aces" a prémio. Pouco importa quem o mate, desde que o faça rapidamente...

programme.title: Um Trunfo na Manga 2
programme.desc: A história de um modesto agente do FBI, Walter Weed, cuja cabeça tem um preço muito alto.

programme.title: A Escala: Amizade em Segundo Lugar
programme.desc: Meg e Kate, duas melhores amigas solteiras, veem os planos de férias bruscamente alterados quando o avião em que iam segue uma nova rota devido a um aviso de furacão. Durante uma escala prolongada em St. Louis, as duas amigas competem pela atenção de um homem atraente que viajava no mesmo voo.

programme.title: Miss Detective 2: Armada e Fabulosa
programme.desc: Depois do seu ato heróico no último concurso de eleição da Miss América, a agente especial Gracie Hart tornou-se demasiado conhecida para continuar a fazer trabalho de campo para o FBI. Agora, Gracie é a "cara" do FBI em todo o tipo de programas de televisão e tem uma nova colega.

programme.title: Perdido em Marte
programme.desc: Durante uma missão a Marte, o astronauta Mark Watney é dado como morto e deixado para trás pela tripulação. Mas Watney sobreviveu e encontra-se preso e só num planeta hostil. Agora, terá de encontrar forma de enviar para a Terra um sinal de que está vivo.

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy tem de transportar uma droga sintética dentro do próprio corpo. Quando é apanhada e agredida, o saco rompe-se e a droga é assimilada pelo seu organismo. Transformada numa verdadeira máquina de matar, tem apenas uma coisa em mente: encontrar uma forma de parar os efeitos e salvar a sua vida.

programme.title: Ninguém Sobrevive
programme.desc: Um gangue de implacáveis assassinos rapta um casal rico que viaja pelo país. No entanto, acabam por descobrir que as coisas nem sempre são aquilo que aparentam.

programme.title: Contrabando
programme.desc: Chris abandonou a sua vida de crime, mas após Andy arruinar um negócio ao seu impiedoso patrão, Chris vê-se obrigado a voltar àquilo que melhor faz: contrabandear. Forma equipa com Sebastian para um golpe final no Panamá, mas quando o plano cai, terá de recorrer às suas enferrujadas habilidades!

programme.title: A Águia da Nona Legião
programme.desc: No ano de 140 a.C., 20 anos após o desaparecimento misterioso de toda a Nona Legião nas montanhas da Escócia, Marcus Aquila chega de Roma para resolver o mistério. Acompanhado apenas pelo seu escravo Esca, Marcus atravessa a Muralha de Adriano e entra nos planaltos desconhecidos da Caledónia.

programme.title: O Despertar da Lenda
programme.desc: Um habilidoso lutador de artes marciais regressa à sua cidade natal, onde o pai foi morto por um poder obscuro. O objetivo é enfrentar um impiedoso patrão do crime e trazer de novo justiça para os habitantes locais.

programme.title: A Salvação
programme.desc: Na América, durante a década de 1870, um pacífico colono dinamarquês mata o homem que assassinou a sua família, originando a fúria de um conhecido gangster. Traído pelos seus conterrâneos cobardes, terá agora de enfrentar a fúria dos fora da lei sozinho.

programme.title: Filho do Crime
programme.desc: Depois de ir parar à cadeia por um pequeno delito, o jovem JR conhece um mundo sem leis, onde cada um se protege apenas a si mesmo. Aos poucos aproxima-se de Brendan Lynch, um famoso criminoso, que se torna seu mentor e protetor. Mas tudo tem um preço...

programme.title: 12 Indomáveis
programme.desc: A história da primeira equipa de agentes da CIA e forças especiais destacada para o Afeganistão, após os ataques de 11 de Setembro, numa tentativa de derrubar o regime talibã. No entanto, para isso, terão de colaborar com um senhor da guerra afegão.

programme.title: Os Reis da Rua
programme.desc: Tom Ludlow, um polícia veterano de Los Angeles, passa por dificuldades após a morte da mulher. Quando as provas o apontam como responsável pela execução violenta de um colega, ele vê-se forçado a ir contra a própria cultura policial, questionando a lealdade e honestidade de todos os que o rodeiam.

programme.title: Point Break - Caçadores de Emoções
programme.desc: Um jovem agente do FBI infiltra-se num grupo de bandidos, amantes de desportos radicais, suspeito de cometer os mais bizarros e assustadores assaltos. O agente rapidamente consegue aproximar-se de Bodhi, o líder do grupo, e conquistar a sua confiança.

programme.title: Vista Pela Última Vez...
programme.desc: Dois detetives privados de Boston investigam o rapto de uma menina de quatro anos, contratados pela tia desta. O caso conduz a dupla a uma crise profissional, mas também pessoal e, conforme o desfecho do caso se aproxima, Kenzie e Gennaro têm de enfrentar um dilema moral que os pode destruir.

programme.title: A Glória dos Campeões
programme.desc: Arqui-inimigos na patinagem no gelo, os campeões Chazz Michael Michaels e Jimmy MacElroy acabam por ser oficialmente afastados das competições devido à sua rivalidade descontrolada. Para voltarem a competir, têm de se unir para formar a primeira dupla masculina na história da modalidade.

programme.title: Contrabando
programme.desc: Chris abandonou a sua vida de crime, mas após Andy arruinar um negócio ao seu impiedoso patrão, Chris vê-se obrigado a voltar àquilo que melhor faz: contrabandear. Forma equipa com Sebastian para um golpe final no Panamá, mas quando o plano cai, terá de recorrer às suas enferrujadas habilidades!

programme.title: Filho do Crime
programme.desc: Depois de ir parar à cadeia por um pequeno delito, o jovem JR conhece um mundo sem leis, onde cada um se protege apenas a si mesmo. Aos poucos aproxima-se de Brendan Lynch, um famoso criminoso, que se torna seu mentor e protetor. Mas tudo tem um preço...

programme.title: Alleycats - Pedalar Ou Morrer
programme.desc: Um estafeta de bicicleta é testemunha de um homicídio. A sua curiosidade sobre o caso faz com que rapidamente se veja envolvido numa trama de corrupção, política e corridas ilegais.

programme.title: 12 Indomáveis
programme.desc: A história da primeira equipa de agentes da CIA e forças especiais destacada para o Afeganistão, após os ataques de 11 de Setembro, numa tentativa de derrubar o regime talibã. No entanto, para isso, terão de colaborar com um senhor da guerra afegão.

programme.title: Perdido em Marte
programme.desc: Durante uma missão a Marte, o astronauta Mark Watney é dado como morto e deixado para trás pela tripulação. Mas Watney sobreviveu e encontra-se preso e só num planeta hostil. Agora, terá de encontrar forma de enviar para a Terra um sinal de que está vivo.

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: Susan Cooper, uma simples e sedentária analista da CIA, é uma heroína não reconhecida por detrás das missões mais perigosas da Agência. No entanto, quando a identidade do seu parceiro é comprometida, Cooper infiltra-se no mundo do tráfico de armas.

programme.title: Point Break - Caçadores de Emoções
programme.desc: Um jovem agente do FBI infiltra-se num grupo de bandidos, amantes de desportos radicais, suspeito de cometer os mais bizarros e assustadores assaltos. O agente rapidamente consegue aproximar-se de Bodhi, o líder do grupo, e conquistar a sua confiança.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: Blade, um guerreiro metade humano e metade vampiro, e a sua companheira combatem um vampiro cruel que tenta provocar um verdadeiro apocalipse.

programme.title: Blade II
programme.desc: Blade forma uma inesperada aliança com os seus anteriores inimigos, os vampiros. Contudo, esta nova espécie de vampiros, geneticamente alterada, revela-se uma enorme ameaça para os novos aliados, uma vez que se alimenta de outros vampiros, e Blade vai tem de usar toda a sua destreza.

programme.title: Fronteira Explosiva
programme.desc: Na tentativa de esquecer o seu passado, Jack aceita trabalho como vigilante na fronteira. No entanto, derrotar os criminosos revela-se uma tarefa árdua.

programme.title: O Último Rei da Escócia
programme.desc: Em 1971, quando trabalhava no Uganda, um jovem médico escocês tornou-se o médico pessoal, confidente e principal conselheiro de Idi Amin Dada. Nicholas passa então a frequentar o "círculo" interno de um dos mais terríveis ditadores de África...

programme.title: Junto ao Mar
programme.desc: França, anos 70. Vanessa, uma antiga bailarina, e Roland, um escritor americano, viajam pelo país até chegarem a uma pequena vila costeira. Aí, o afastamento que existe entre ambos é substituído pela proximidade que sentem com alguns dos habitantes locais.

programme.title: Sobrevivente
programme.desc: Depois de ser incriminada por um ataque bombista, Kate Abbott, uma funcionária do Departamento de Estado Americano, é obrigada a fugir das forças policiais e de um impiedoso assassino. Ao mesmo tempo, procura travar o aterrador plano dos verdadeiros terroristas.

programme.title: Mr. Holmes
programme.desc: Em 1947, um envelhecido e retirado Sherlock Holmes lança um olhar sobre a sua vida e relembra as circunstâncias do caso não resolvido que o obrigou a reformar-se, procurando respostas para os mistérios da vida e do amor, antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Vencer a Qualquer Preço
programme.desc: Um jornalista irlandês desconfia que o sucesso de Lance Armstrong se deve ao uso de substâncias ilícitas. Movido pela vontade de desmascarar o ciclista norte-americano, começa a procurar provas que denunciem Armstrong.

programme.title: Amor Polar
programme.desc: Um pai maníaco-depressivo tenta reconquistar a mulher, responsabilizando-se pelas suas duas jovens e espirituosas filhas, que não lhe vão facilitar nada a vida.

programme.title: Braveheart - O Desafio do Guerreiro
programme.desc: Finais do século XIII. Devido a uma crise dinástica, a Escócia é integrada na Inglaterra. O rei Eduardo I e a nobreza humilham o país, que dominam com mão de ferro. Wallace lidera um exército de camponeses e patriotas e empurra os ingleses até às fronteiras. O rei envia então a nora para negociar...

programme.title: Passageiros
programme.desc: Após um grave e misterioso acidente de aviação, uma jovem terapeuta, Claire, é destacada para dar aconselhamento aos poucos sobreviventes. No processo de partilha das recordações traumáticas do incidente, Claire fica intrigada com o passageiro mais evasivo, Eric, por quem acaba por se apaixonar.

programme.title: Fenómeno
programme.desc: Após a passagem de uma estranha luz no céu, um homem adquire poderes sobrenaturais e desenvolve uma inteligência superior.

programme.title: Second In Command - Em Território Inimigo
programme.desc: Ao assumir o seu novo posto, um antigo SEAL vai ter de defender a embaixada norte-americana, de um país da Europa de Leste, de um bando de perigosos terroristas.

programme.title: Mystic River
programme.desc: Jimmy, Dave e Sean cresceram juntos em Boston, sendo que Dave foi vítima de um trágico acontecimento. Vinte e cinco anos mais tarde, o assassínio da filha de Jimmy volta a reuni-los. Sean, agora polícia, está à frente do caso e tem de o resolver antes que Jimmy consiga justiça pelas próprias mãos.

programme.title: A Purga
programme.desc: No futuro, o Governo dos EUA constata que as suas prisões estão cheias demais para admitir novos reclusos. Cria então uma lei que permite todas as atividades ilegais durante 12 horas. Neste período, uma família terá de se proteger de um maníaco.

programme.title: Guerra
programme.desc: Depois da morte brutal do seu parceiro às mãos do assassino Rogue, o agente do FBI Jack Crawford decide iniciar uma vingança pessoal. Mas acaba por perder o rasto a Rogue, que só volta a aparecer três anos depois, numa sangrenta guerra entre a máfia chinesa o os yakuzas japoneses.

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous - Vingança Silenciosa
programme.desc: O assassino profissional e surdo-mudo Kong apaixona-se por Fong. É então que vai ter que escolher entre a vida que leva, ou uma vida normal.

programme.title: Getaway - Em Fuga
programme.desc: Todos os segundos contam para o antigo piloto Brent Magna, que conduz furiosamente pelas ruas da Bulgária para salvar a mulher. Desesperado, leva o carro de uma jovem, com ela lá dentro, e inicia um contrarrelógio para cumprir tarefas cada vez mais perigosas. Se falharem, a mulher de Brent morre.

programme.title: Amor em Little Italy
programme.desc: Dois jovens de Little Italy apaixonam-se, mas têm de lutar contra a oposição das respetivas famílias, eternas rivais no bairro e donas de pizzarias concorrentes, que tentam constantemente sabotar-se mutuamente.

programme.title: Os Deuses Devem Estar Loucos
programme.desc: Uma comédia sobre um viajante que encontra a civilização moderna e os seus aspetos mais bizarros, incluindo um cientista desajeitado e um bando de revolucionários.

programme.title: A Modista
programme.desc: Quando Tilly chega a casa, não só se reconcilia com a mãe, mas também com a sua máquina de costura. Recorrendo à sua experiência na alta-costura, Tilly transforma as mulheres da cidade de tal forma que consegue vingar-se de quem antes lhe tinha feito mal.

programme.title: A Cada Dia
programme.desc: Baseado no aclamado best-seller homónimo, "A Cada Dia" conta a história de Rhiannon, uma rapariga de 16 anos que se apaixona por uma misteriosa alma chamada "A". A cada dia, esta ocupa um corpo diferente.

programme.title: Uma Entrevista de Loucos
programme.desc: Dois jornalistas de um popular talk show conseguem uma entrevista com o líder da Coreia do Norte, Kim Jong-un, que é fã do programa. Mas, quando se preparam para viajar para Pyongyang, os seus planos mudam, já que a CIA os recruta para assassinarem o ditador.

programme.title: O Poder e o Impossível
programme.desc: Um praticante de snowboard em busca de momentos de adrenalina perde-se no meio de uma tempestade massiva. É levado aos limites da resistência humana e ainda forçado a batalhar os seus demónios pessoais, enquanto tenta sobreviver.

programme.title: Fuga
programme.desc: Intrigados com a história de Mud, Ellis e Neckbone decidem ajudar o homem. Apesar de ter sido acusado de homicídio e ter caçadores de recompensas no seu encalce, justifica os seus atos criminosos com o seu grande amor, Juniper, que o espera na cidade para fugir com ele.

programme.title: Até ao Último Combate
programme.desc: Perturbado com a morte recente do seu pai, um adolescente tenta controlar a raiva que o consome e, para tal, começa a frequentar aulas de artes marciais.

programme.title: Os Rapazes de Dezembro
programme.desc: Num verão em que vão passar férias junto ao mar, quatro órfãos, que nasceram todos no mês de dezembro e cresceram muito unidos, veem-se a competir entre si pela atenção da mesma família. Isto porque conhecem um casal jovem, que não consegue ter filhos e mostra interesse em adotar um deles.

programme.title: Stuber
programme.desc: Stu, um motorista de Uber, está prestes a viver a mais aterrorizante (e emocionante) aventura da sua vida quando Vic, um detetive da Polícia de Los Angeles, entra no seu carro decidido a caçar um perigoso terrorista.

programme.title: O Homem Que Matou o Hitler e Depois o Bigfoot
programme.desc: Calvin Barr é um velho recluso que foi outrora o agente que matou Adolf Hitler e cujo feito se tornou um segredo de estado. Agora, ele é forçado a sair da reforma para uma última missão secreta: encontrar e eliminar o Bigfoot, que está infetado com uma doença letal que pode matar toda a gente.

programme.title: Grimm
Grimm
programme.desc: Grimm: Created by Stephen Carpenter, David Greenwalt, Jim Kouf. With David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nandi1023"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Grimm","reviewBody":"This is a GREAT show!...Cleverly written and the actors are wonderful! A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"nandi1023","dateCreated":"2011-12-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Grimm","reviewBody":"This is a GREAT show!...Cleverly written and the actors are wonderful! Our Family LOVES this show! The way the writers mix the Grimm's Fairy tales into present day plots are very interesting. Seeing Portland,Oregon in all it's beauty and lushness is quite breathtaking. We especially liked the refrigerator repair man on "Danse Macabre". Of course Monroe is always fun. Kate Burton was a wonderful surprise on the pilot episode. Our Family LOVES this show! The way the writers mix the Grimm's Fairy tales into present day plots are very interesting. Seeing Portland,Oregon in all it's beauty and lushness is quite breathtaking. We especially liked the refrigerator repair man on "Danse Macabre". Of course Monroe is always fun. Kate Burton was a wonderful surprise on the pilot episode. David Giuntoli and Danny Bruno are AWESOME!!!!!!! The special effects are amazing. We like the autopsy scenes too even though pretty gruesome! It's way cool! I hope that NBC does the smart thing and keeps this one going... It's certainly a HIT in our house. programme.title: Predestinado
programme.desc: A história de um Agente Temporal, que é enviado numa série de viagens no tempo para caçar criminosos. Agora, como última missão, o Agente tem de capturar um criminoso que o tem enganado e, assim, tem conseguido escapar ao longo do tempo.

programme.title: Espécie Mortal
programme.desc: Quando um híbrido "humano-alienígena", que estava sob observação, foge, o cientista Xavier Fitch envia uma equipa de peritos à sua procura. No rasto da presa pela cidade de LA, a equipa descobre o seu horrível plano: acasalar com homens e criar uma prole capaz de destruir a Humanidade.

A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nandi1023"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Grimm","reviewBody":"This is a GREAT show!...Cleverly written and the actors are wonderful! Our Family LOVES this show! The way the writers mix the Grimm's Fairy tales into present day plots are very interesting. Seeing Portland,Oregon in all it's beauty and lushness is quite breathtaking. We especially liked the refrigerator repair man on "Danse Macabre". Of course Monroe is always fun. Kate Burton was a wonderful surprise on the pilot episode. David Giuntoli and Danny Bruno are AWESOME!!!!!!! The special effects are amazing. We like the autopsy scenes too even though pretty gruesome! It's way cool! I hope that NBC does the smart thing and keeps this one going... It's certainly a HIT in our house. Sincerely, Nancy Di Leo and Family.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":113464,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: O arqueólogo Daniel Jackson descobre como fazer funcionar um portal estelar descoberto debaixo de uma pirâmide. O coronel Jack O'Neil recebe a missão de acompanhar Jackson e uma pequena equipa de soldados americanos através do "Stargate", a fim de explorar a galáxia desconhecida do outro lado.

Grimm
programme.desc: Grimm: Created by Stephen Carpenter, David Greenwalt, Jim Kouf. With David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nandi1023"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Grimm","reviewBody":"This is a GREAT show!...Cleverly written and the actors are wonderful! Our Family LOVES this show! The way the writers mix the Grimm's Fairy tales into present day plots are very interesting. Seeing Portland,Oregon in all it's beauty and lushness is quite breathtaking. We especially liked the refrigerator repair man on "Danse Macabre". Of course Monroe is always fun. Kate Burton was a wonderful surprise on the pilot episode. David Giuntoli and Danny Bruno are AWESOME!!!!!!! The special effects are amazing. We like the autopsy scenes too even though pretty gruesome! It's way cool! I hope that NBC does the smart thing and keeps this one going... It's certainly a HIT in our house. Sincerely, Nancy Di Leo and Family.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":113464,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Aberto Até de Madrugada
programme.desc: Dois irmãos, ladrões e assassinos, raptam um pastor religioso e os seus dois filhos adolescentes para conseguirem chegar ao México. Perto da fronteira, param num bar frequentado por "motards" mal-encarados sem desconfiarem que o lugar é, na verdade, um ponto de encontro de vampiros.

programme.title: Espécie Mortal II
programme.desc: Durante uma missão a Marte, o astronauta Patrick Ross é infetado pelo ADN de um alienígena. De regresso à Terra, ele começa a transformar-se num terrífico ser extraterrestre. Agora, quer ter relações sexuais com Eve, um clone da bonita e mortífera híbrido que os humanos pensavam ter destruído.
